column5: This has got to be THE funniest and coolest clip I have seen
Next year at the sportsman show... Chicken baits.
Now thast is pretty cool..     ..The one reason why I dont like to cast....!
That is awesome!!!
The Colonel has another reason to keep his recipe a secret!
That's wicked.  The ideas are just rushing through my head now!
note to self  pick up some bait at KFC, for the next muskie outing
Is anybody throwing double chickens yet?
growing up a friends crazy uncle always told us day old salami was the best pike bait you could use.
I guess thats where Jessica Simpson got the idea that fish tastes like chicken and started her own Brand name of products......
Now that's funny, thanks for the laugh.  I'll have to try that.  Wonder if leftover thankgiving turkey is the ticket
hahaha thats freakin priceless!

MMMMMMMMMMMM   Chicken  " ♫  Everybody needs a a little KFC  ♫  !!! "   That was awesome     ... cool Video..   I'm having fresh Partridge for supper... might just go try my luck for some Muskie tomorrow morning.   RFS
Thats awesome.. but not as good as this one!!!  Turn your volume up so you can hear the duck!!
One of these days when you least expect it I'm gonna get you back for that.
Un real...Man those fish are monsters
Now I feel stupid for spending $20 on a musky lure
hmmmmm.,,,,,,  if a muskie will eat a chicken....  would a bass eat left over lasagna... inquiring minds wanna know
what about a live one???
Gah whaaa haaaaa haaaaaa  lol, coromorant...snorf.   I hear pike can be vegans though...y'know when they lose their teeth during the summer
that was awesome. I have half a leftover pork chop I was going to throw out but maybe not...

That one's so old, the first time I saw it I was too young to laugh... so I rolled over and pooped to show my appreciation.  .. but the biggest surprise is that Solopaddler fell for it!!!... where have you been living Bubba?... Canada???
Unlike some people my life doesn't revolve around the computer screen. Sometimes things slip by me, what can I say?  He definitely got me that's for sure.
